description:
This course focuses on the understanding of the process of economic
development. The course will be structured around the four main questions:
(1) Why are some countries much poorer than others? (2) What are the main
barriers to the process of economic development? (3) What are the main
barriers that prevent the poor to escape from poverty?, and (4) Why do
these barriers exist and persist?
title: Development Economics
prerequisite: YSS2203 Intermediate Microeconomics and YSS2211 Econometrics or with the permission of the instructor.
